modName: Spell of Luminus - Night Brightness Adjuster V2B
summary:
Adds a Spell of Luminus that let\'s you make the nights brighter or darker.
Timer is set from 20.00 pm till 6.00 am.
You can find the spell at the Magic->Powers menu.
Shuts of automatically at 6am. 
Shuts of automatically at 6am and reapplies chosen setting each night at 20pm until you recast the spell for a different setting.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a Spell of Luminus that let\'s you make the nights brighter or darker.
Timer is set from 20.00 pm till 6.00 am.
You can find the spell at the Magic->Powers menu.
Shuts of automatically at 6am and reapplies chosen setting each night at 20pm until you recast the spell for a different setting.

Just unpack the rar file and take out the Data map and copy it to your Skyrim install folder.
When asked to merge the dir with the already exsistent Data folder one respondes with yes.

In game you immediately will be given the spell, as said at Magic->Powers->Spell of Luminus.
Equip and set the night brightness you want and you are ready to Rock and Troll !

Screenshots are taken with URWL V2B Dark version.
author: Marco
